mean_cn: adj. 两面穿的，两面可用的，可逆的
mean_en: (of clothes, materials, etc.) that can be turned inside out and worn or used with either side showing
sentence: My reversible jacket has different colors on each side.
sentence_trans: 我那件可以两面穿的夹克颜色各不相同。
word_etyma: re回，向后 ＋ vers=vert转 ＋ ible形容词后缀 → reversible可倒转的，可逆的
